Module org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting
Package org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.internal

Class MemoryJavaFileManager

java.lang.Object
javax.tools.ForwardingJavaFileManager<JavaFileManager>
org.tquadrat.foundation.scripting.internal.MemoryJavaFileManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable, JavaFileManager, OptionChecker
@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: MemoryJavaFileManager.java 1070 2023-09-29 17:09:34Z tquadrat $") @API(status=INTERNAL, since="0.0.5") public final class MemoryJavaFileManager extends ForwardingJavaFileManager<JavaFileManager>
An implementation of JavaFileManager that keeps compiled .class bytes in memory.
Author:
A. Sundararajan
Modified by:
Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)
Version:
$Id: MemoryJavaFileManager.java 1070 2023-09-29 17:09:34Z tquadrat $
Since:
0.0.5

    • EXT

      private static final String EXT
      Java source file extension: ".java".
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • m_ClassBytes

      private Map<String,byte[]> m_ClassBytes
      The byte code that is stored by this file manager instance. The name of the class is the key to the map, the value is the byte code of that class.

    • toURI

      static URI toURI(String name)
      Translates the given name to an URI.

      If an error occurs, the default "mfm:///org/tquadrat/script/java/java_source" will be returned.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to translate.
      Returns:
      The newly generated URI.
